dict.acceptation: 如果；假如；在…条件下；倘若；
提供，供给，供应( provide的现在分词)；规定；提供[(+for)]；装备；

sent.orig: Providing customer self-service involves providing customers with secure web-browser access to automated order systems.
sent.trans: 提供高质量顾客自助服务包括提供给顾客对自动订单处理系统的安全的网络浏览进入。

sent.orig: Literature providing business shall also be highlighted to broaden the spec and width of literature providing.
sent.trans: 强化文献提供业务，拓展文献提供的范围与广度。

sent.orig: Manage to realize to transit from providing single-form source to providing integrated source.
sent.trans: 在服务内容上：实现从提供单一形式资源向提供集成资源过渡。

sent.orig: The method comprises providing the substrate with a wear protection layer and providing corrosion resistant layer.
sent.trans: 该方法包括向基材提供耐磨层和耐蚀层。

sent.orig: Responsible for providing beverage service to guests and cocktail servers while providing excellent customer relations.
sent.trans: 在为宾客提供饮料及鸡尾酒服务的同时，负责和宾客建立起良好的人脉关系。
